text: 90% Wide nasal bridge 90% Abnormality of the aorta 50% Abnormality of the nipple 50% Abnormality of the ribs 50% Anterior creases of earlobe 50% Downturned corners of mouth 50% Long palpebral fissure 50% Long philtrum 50% Plagiocephaly 50% Proximal placement of thumb 50% Single transverse palmar crease 50% Tetralogy of Fallot 50% Ventricular septal defect 50% The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition.
